comment.author: 30817808@N00
comment._content: Well was this a Franco-British /Celt influence from the 19-20the centuries or more ancient pagentry.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Most likely the influence of Scottish regiments posted in the Middle East in the 19th-20th centuries. The instruments are the same as the traditional Scottish pipes, right down to the use of tartan for the bags.  ~Mary
